titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I celebrated the Holy Communion in the Chapel at 8a.m. Feddon, 7 candidates, Lionel & I wee the communicants – 10 in all. After breakfast I set to work on a 'Charge', and practically finished it. The Bishop of Jarrow came across before lunch, and after lunch came Moulesdale and Dawson Walker.
Also Herbert Fletcher for the Bishop of Qu'Appelle is to be ordained to the priesthood.
I gave the four deacon candidates a copy of 'Church & Parson in England', to every one a copy.
